articles.author: Sriram Veera
articles.title: Cheteshwar Pujara Exclusive: ‘The pride and passion with which I have played… that will never change’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: BONUS VIEWING INSIDE: Australian players recall the hard toil of bowling to Cheteswar Pujara and experts give their view on why is he as important as Virat Kohli in the Indian batting lineup
articles.content: A couple of evenings ahead of India’s third Test against England, Cheteshwar Pujarais driving with his wife and daughter to his hometown Rajkot from Ahmedabad. Its his 11th wedding anniversary and th… [+5071 chars]
